docstrings: * Use this class to annotate methods in {@link ExceptionTranslationSource} which should * be used for translations. * The signature of this method should accept and return an instance of a class inherited * from {@link Exception}. * Note: * Since generic arguments can not be determined at runtime the return type should be plain * object (not {@link java.util.Optional}. However you can safely return {@code null} from * this method in order to skip translation.
